articles.title: Interest rates: Bank of England governor admits rise painful for many - BBC
articles.description: "If we don't raise rates now, it could be worse later," Bank of England boss warns as it raises rates again.
articles.content:
The boss of Bank of England has denied trying to create an economic slump after it put up interest rates by more than expected to slow soaring prices.

articles.title: Basket-case central bank does bumper interest rate hike - Financial Times
articles.content:
A stunning hike by Norges Bank today, with a 50bps move to 3.75 per cent.

articles.title: Mortgages: Customers given 20 minutes to decide on renewal - BBC
articles.description: Deals are changing so fast customers face making snap decisions or risk losing deals, a broker says.
articles.content:
